coverage_details.checkup: Medical checkup is covered up to 1,000 SAR in main cities: Jeddah, Riyadh, Dammam (Two providers in each city) SAR 1,300 (Fakeeh -NEOM provider)
coverage_details.vaccination: Covered up to Annual Limit; Flu and Haj vaccination is covered
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR2,000.00 (Covered up to Optical sublimit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered in KSA only (Heart, Liver and Kidney); Donor costs included (excluding life organ value); Artificial organ transplant for up to 50 cases per NEOM request; Artificial Limbs & Prosthesis, Advanced Electronic Cochlear Transplantation covered
coverage_details.dental_general: Scaling twice per year is covered; General dentistry as per Bupa Standard table
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00; Cover includes all lenses options (excluding contact lenses)
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered up to Annual Limit; Advanced modalities and when requested by treating doctor
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorization required for outpatient & inpatient services for VIP (except for services with limits such as dental, optical, maternity, hearing aids); Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit
coverage_details.special_instructions: Acne warts and hypo/hyper pigmentation skin disease covered; FreeStyle Libre covered; Pain management covered; Advanced molecular/genetic testing covered; Allergy tests covered; Medical appliances and physical aids (crutches, walking sticks, wheelchair etc.) covered when medically needed; RTA cases, police report not required for initial treatment; Recreation scuba diving up to 33 feet covered; Non-professional sport accidents covered (except ice skiing, skydiving, scuba diving); Registered vitamins, herbal medicines, mouthwash, eye pads, gauzes, bandage, back support belt, etc., covered if recommended; Vitamin D/B12 covered as per doctor; MRI and physiotherapy covered as per treating doctor; Trifocal lens covered for cataract surgery.

coverage_details.special_instructions: Acne warts and hypo/hyper pigmentation skin disease covered for VVIP and C schemes; FreeStyle Libre covered; Pain management covered; Advanced molecular/genetic testing covered; Allergy tests covered; Medical appliances and physical aids (crutches, walking sticks, wheelchair etc.) covered when medically needed; RTA cases, police report not required for initial treatment; Recreation scuba diving up to 33 feet covered; Non-professional sport accidents covered (except ice skiing, skydiving, scuba diving); Registered vitamins, herbal medicines, mouthwash, eye pads, gauzes, bandage, back support belt, etc., covered if recommended; Vitamin D/B12 covered as per doctor; MRI and physiotherapy covered as per treating doctor; Trifocal lens covered for cataract surgery.
